ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) can artichoke hearts in water, drained
1 (16 ounce) package bacon slices, cut into thirds crosswise

enrichment.coachingPrompt: These crispy appetizers require careful frying technique. How would you ensure the bacon crisps while the artichoke heart heats through without drying out?
